entry.source: 〉 {F843,0} touched the panel that{F801}said "2013W"...{F801}{F802}〉 The screen displayed the requested{F801}file...{F801}{F802}Special news bulletin! The full story{F801}on the mysterious Counter-Demon Force!{F801}{F802}The Counter-Demon Force is a special ops{F801}group trained in anti-demon warfare.{F801}{F802}It was formed under the command of{F801}Defense Minister Tamagami.{F801}{F802}Their chief advantage is the Demonica{F801}Suit made in Country A, specifically the{F801}smart terminal embedded in the left arm.{F801}{F802}The force primarily consists of former{F801}SDF troops and police officers, with a{F801}few civilians in the ranks as well.{F801}{F802}After Country A's supremacy, Japan's{F801}combat efficiency in demon warfare is{F801}the second best in the world.{F801}
entry.target: 〉 {F843,0} touched the panel that{F801}said "2013W"...{F801}{F802}〉 The screen displayed the requested{F801}file...{F801}{F802}Special news bulletin! entry.source: 〉 {F843,0} touched the panel that{F801}said "2013G"...{F801}{F802}〉 The screen displayed the requested{F801}file...{F801}{F802}〉 It is a log of posts to a bulletin{F801}board from 25 years ago.{F801}{F802}"The train stopped! What happened!?"{F801}"Hey, it's my GF's birthday tomorrow..."{F801}{F802}"Did you see the news!? They were talking{F801}about demons!" "The Demon Summoning{F801}Program, huh? That sounds... bad..."{F801}{F802}"How could the government try to cover{F801}this up!?" "Japan is finished..."{F801}{F802}"Anyone who's still standing, come to{F801}the underground district!" "If I'm gonna{F801}die, it'll be doing the things I love."{F801}{F802}"The gates of Hell have opened." "If you{F801}want to survive, run the program and..."{F801}{F802}〉 The old log ends here.{F801}

entry.source: 〉 {F843,0} touched the panel that{F801}said "2013H"...{F801}{F802}〉 The screen displayed the requested{F801}file...{F801}{F802}〉 It is a summary of the Demon Summoning{F801}Program.{F801}{F802}The "Demon Summoning Program" became{F801}famous among netizens in 2012.{F801}{F802}In most cases, it was installed in the{F801}user's PC or smartphone.{F801}{F802}Once the application is run, the boot-up{F801}screen shows a message that says "Your{F801}life has just changed forever."{F801}{F802}Rumor has it that some users of the{F801}Demon Summoning Program actually{F801}succeeded in summoning demons...{F801}{F802}Some of those even managed to converse{F801}with them.{F801}{F802}But no one really knows why the Demon{F801}Summoning Program was created.{F801}{F802}Let alone who created it and distributed{F801}it worldwide. Many unsolved mysteries{F801}surround the Demon Summoning Program...{F801}
entry.target: 〉 {F843,0} touched the panel that{F801}said "2013H"...{F801}{F802}〉 The screen displayed the requested{F801}file...{F801}{F802}〉 It is a summary of the Demon Summoning{F801}Program.{F801}{F802}The "Demon Summoning Program" became{F801}famous among netizens in 2012.{F801}{F802}In most cases, it was installed in the{F801}user's PC or smartphone.{F801}{F802}Once the application is run, the boot-up{F801}screen shows a message that says "Your{F801}life has just changed forever."{F801}{F802}Rumor has it that some users of the{F801}Demon Summoning Program actually{F801}succeeded in summoning demons...{F801}{F802}Some of those even managed to converse{F801}with them.{F801}{F802}But no one really knows why the Demon{F801}Summoning Program was created.{F801}{F802}Let alone who created it and distributed{F801}it worldwide. Many unsolved mysteries{F801}surround the Demon Summoning Program...{F801}
